text: James (Son of Alphaeus) was one of the Twelve Apostles of Jesus. He has traditionally been identified with James the Just, bishop of Jerusalem. == Relation to Matthew == Matthew/Levi is also called son of Alphaeus in the Gospel of Mark 2:14 so tradition has them as brothers but the New Testament does not state this, unlike the sons of Zebedee, Saint James and John. Category:Twelve Apostles
title: James (son of Alphaeus)
